subtitles: 16057 18351 First, there was darkness.
19894 22772 Then came the Strangers.

22772 25567 They were a race
as old as time itself.

26609 29279 They had mastered
the ultimate technology--

29362 34617 the ability to alter
physical reality by will alone.

34617 37287 They called this ability
"Tuning."
38455 40290 But they were dying.

40373 43418 Their civilization was
in decline,

43418 46129 and so they abandoned
their world,

46212 48882 seeking a cure
for their own mortality.

50258 53720 Their endless journey brought
them to a small, blue world...

53803 55889 in the farthest corner
of the galaxy.
56931 58391 Our world.

59434 61436 Here, they thought
they had finally found...

61478 63438 what they had been
searching for.

74240 77118 My name is
Dr. Daniel Poe Schreber.
78119 79788 I am just a man.

79829 82624 I help the Strangers
conduct their experiments.
84167 86252 I have betrayed my own kind.
293668 295503 You are confused, aren't you?

295545 298340 Frightened. That's all right.
I can help you.

298340 299966 -Who is this?
-I'm a doctor.

300008 302719 You must listen to me.
You have lost your memory.

302719 304888 There was an experiment.
Something went wrong.

304888 307057 Your memory was erased.
Do you understand me?

307140 309184 No, I don't understand.
What's going on here?

309225 312020 There are people coming for you
as we speak.

312062 314356 Don't let them find you.
Leave now.
315565 317734 Hello? Are you there?

359901 362362 Hey, Mr. Murdoch,
the Automat called.
362404 363905 Said you left your wallet there.

364948 368576 I suggest you retrieve it, since
you only paid for three weeks,
368618 370412 and they was up 10 minutes ago.
372455 373957 I've been here three weeks?

373957 377127 It's right there
in black and white, Mr. Murdoch.
377127 379587 Day and date.

379629 382924 We make our books like we make
our beds, all neat and tidy.

382966 385969 -I'll take care of it later.
-See that you do.

385969 388138 Only thing makes you a guest
in this joint...
388138 389556 is cash on the barrelhead!

407449 410160 House rules.
Three weeks is three weeks.
410160 412746 No days off for good behavior.

423673 427302 Mr. Murdoch, yes?
Where is he?

427344 430805 He just left
not five minutes ago.

436519 440523 When the rumba rhythm
start to play
440607 442776 Dance with me
442817 445862 Make me sway
445862 449866 Like a lazy ocean hugs the shore
449866 452118 Hold me close
452160 455038 Sway me more

455038 459334 Like a flower bending
in the breeze
459376 461795 Bend with me
461836 464673 Sway with ease

464714 468677 When we dance,
you have a way with me
468718 471179 Stay with me
471179 473723 Sway with me

474557 478561 Hey, sweetie, he said he was
your husband's doctor.
478645 480188 He wanted to speak with you.

503586 505171 -Doctor...
-Schreber.

505255 509259 Please, won't you come in?
You must be Emma Murdoch.

510593 514014 Thank you for coming to see me
on such short notice.
514055 515515 What is this?

515557 519102 A rather crude experiment
designed to further my studies.

519185 522856 I don't understand. You say
you're my husband's doctor,

522897 525442 but he never
mentioned you to me.

525442 528278 The truth is, John has been
coming to see me...
528278 529779 for quite some time.

529779 533116 He had been grappling
with feelings of betrayal...

533199 536244 stemming from
your marital difficulties.

536286 538204 -John told you what happened.
-Yes.

539581 541875 When was the last time
that you saw him?

541916 544794 Three weeks ago.
He packed a suitcase.
544794 547297 He was very angry at me.

547380 550216 I understand how difficult
this must be for you,
550258 551593 but for John's sake,

551634 554596 I would like you to think of me
as your friend, Emma.

554637 558266 It appears that John
has suffered a psychotic break.

558308 561436 -Complete memory loss.
-You can't be serious.

561478 564439 Oh, but I am.
He may be delusional.
564481 565774 Even violent.

567108 571071 If he were to contact you,
you must call me immediately.

571112 573573 Wherever your husband is,
he is searching...
575325 576493 For himself.

586670 590590 Good evening, Mr. Murdoch.
It is Mr. Murdoch, isn't it?
591508 595011 Mr. "J" something Murdoch?

598348 602519 J. Murdoch. What's your name?
Justin? Jerry?

606856 608942 My name's Jason Murdoch.
John Murdoch.

608983 611528 Jake Murdoch. How's it going?
Hi. Jack Murdoch.
617867 619661 Got to get a grip on myself.

643727 647147 I told the guy,
cash on the barrelhead.

647188 650483 I said, "Listen,
three weeks is three weeks."

650525 654070 -Where's our lucky winner?
-Upstairs, sir. Room 614.
655363 656698 The call girl.

661327 664247 -Evening, Husselbeck.
-Inspector Bumstead.
664247 665999 Your lace is untied.
676926 678511 Am I glad you're here, sir.

678553 681181 They say Detective Walenski's
got the heebie-jeebies.

681222 683391 Just take what they give me,
Husselbeck.

714297 716800 -Thanks a lot.
-Excuse me.

719260 721054 -Hello?
-Oh, it's you.

721805 724474 -You left your wallet here.
-When did I do that?

724474 726726 -When you was last here.
-When was that?

726768 730146 When you left your wallet.
Expect me to remember?

735985 738738 -Excuse me!
-No, no, seriously.

756131 757966 -Where you headed, chief?
-Home.
758008 759300 And where's home?

759342 762137 Haven't you mugs got
anything better to do?
762178 764431 I'm just doing my job, May.
764472 766516 There's a killer out there.

766516 769185 Look for him
instead of cooling your heels.
772522 774274 Go on. Get out of here.

787537 790331 What's that make so far?
Six hookers in all?

790331 793209 -I believe so, sir.
-Give the man an "A" for effort.
798673 800967 So, Husselbeck,

801009 807474 what kind of killer do you think
stops to save a dying fish?

807515 809392 -Got me, sir.
-Bumstead.

809392 812729 What took you? This killer's
been running circles around us,
812729 813855 thanks to Walenski.

813897 815690 With all due respect,
Chief lnspector,

815732 818818 I've known Eddie a long time,
and he's a good cop.

818860 821071 Whatever kind of cop
Walenski once was...
821071 823031 he let drift a long time ago.
823073 824866 Let me talk to Bumstead!
824908 826910 Come on! Hold on!

831873 833917 -Get his arm !
-They're watching us!

833917 836211 -On your feet!
-There's no way out!
837587 839339 God, can't you see?

842759 845095 Let me go!
I'm not going to hurt you.

846596 848848 -What was that?
-Walenski.

857232 860360 I'm being punished
for my sins, right?

860402 864739 What did I ever do to inherit
this? Where do you begin?

864739 867701 Well, everything Detective
Walenski committed to paper...
867742 869119 should be here, so--

869202 871788 The only thing that should be
committed is Walenski.

874124 875959 Nothing like
a little healthy paranoia.

882549 885885 I came here to file a missing
persons report for my husband.

885927 889305 -Take it to the front desk.
-They told me to come see you.
891599 893268 His name's John Murdoch.

896312 899649 Do these names mean
anything to you?
900483 902485 Who are these women?

902485 904404 Why are you looking
for my husband?

904446 906656 Are you going to accuse him
of something?

906740 910285 -Maybe. Maybe murder.
-Whose murder?

911661 914956 -Which one?
-All of them.

916332 919669 Mrs. Murdoch, I am sorry.
I didn't mean to alarm you.

919669 922464 I'm sorry that I came.
I just made a mistake.

922505 926259 If you'd please just give me
half a second to explain.
935643 936853 We met before?

938521 941608 If we did,
I hope you're still breathing.
941649 943193 What's your name, honey?

946988 948782 Well, that's
an appropriate name.
956706 957999 I was just thinking.

965006 970053 It seems kind of dangerous...
right now.

970053 972055 How do you know
I'm not the killer?

972055 975308 You don't seem like
the killer type. Why?

976226 978478 You feeling any urges
I should know about?

1039414 1043251 So it seems you've discovered
your unpleasant nature.

1043293 1047088 -Who are you?
-We might ask the same question.

1130213 1133383 What is to be done?
This man is dangerous.

1133466 1136553 -It is said he is able to Tune.
-Impossible!

1136636 1139681 We have seen it
with our own eyes.

1139723 1142559 On occasion, the imprinting
does not take.

1142559 1145145 They behave erratically
when they awaken.

1145186 1148857 We find them wandering
like lost children.
1148898 1151026 But this one was different, yes?

1151067 1154821 -What has the doctor to say?
-He has failed to report in.

1154863 1157991 -And Mr. Quick?
-No more Mr. Quick.
1158033 1160660 Mr. Quick...dead, yes.
1164039 1166666 Poor, poor Mr. Quick.
1166708 1169586 Mr. Book...does he know?
1170587 1172672 Should we not know, Mr. Hand?

1173715 1176593 We had hoped to learn more
before sharing with you.

1176593 1179596 We can know nothing
until we possess him.
1179596 1181848 We must have this man.
1187771 1188938 My brand, I hope.
1201284 1202869 I've been worried about you.
1206915 1208249 Are you punishing me?

1208958 1211628 If disappearing is
your way of punishing me,
1211628 1212879 I don't appreciate it.
1212921 1214089 What are you talking about?

1217592 1221388 I found these keys in my pocket,
so I assume I live here.

1223556 1225892 -You supposed to be my wife?
-"Supposed to be"?

1229437 1233441 You really...don't know
who I am, do you.

1234317 1237112 Your doctor called me. He was
worried that this might happen.

1241324 1245078 He gave me his card.
He's desperate to find you.

1252836 1254838 Feel like I'm living out
someone else's nightmare.

1254838 1257674 What happened to me?
Why was I seeing a doctor?
1258258 1259759 I had an affair.
1261678 1263013 You were angry at me.

1266182 1269853 Closing time.
The pool is now closed.
1279529 1281865 Most unfortunate it is...

1281948 1284200 that we were forced
to seek you out here.

1285201 1289372 You know how uncomfortable
we find all this moisture.

1290206 1293543 -I'm sorry. I--
-Failed to report in, yes?

1293543 1296546 I was frightened.
I have a weak heart, you know.

1296546 1300050 Your weakness is not, we think,
an affair of the heart.
1300133 1302802 We found this in his hotel room.

1302844 1306348 Must we reproduce
Mr. Murdoch's memories again?

1306389 1308516 I tried to reprint him,
but he woke up.

1308558 1310727 He knocked the syringe
right out of my hand.

1310810 1314022 -He has no memories, then?
-Only fragments.

1314022 1315565 The procedure,
it was interrupted.

1315565 1318318 I guess it's only a matter
of rounding him up.

1319069 1320737 You have had strays
before, right?

1320820 1324699 This is no stray, Doctor.
This one can Tune.

1324699 1327744 But that's impossible.
Only you have that ability.

1327827 1330080 You will process
another template...
1330163 1332207 of the subject's memories, yes?

1332248 1333833 Of course.
I'll imprint him again.

1335418 1338672 We require them
for a quite different purpose.

1338713 1341508 It's almost midnight,
Dr. Schreber.

1341549 1343385 We'll talk again
after tonight's Tuning,
1343426 1346346 but no more delays, yes?

1346388 1351184 No more inconsistencies
in your behavior.
1353061 1354729 The police were looking for you.
1354729 1356898 I know. I saw the papers.

1356940 1359442 "Killer stalks
city street-walkers."
1363071 1365365 I was with one of those women.

1366908 1370286 -Before I came here tonight.
-I don't understand.

1370370 1375291 I met her outside an Automat.
I guess I wanted to test myself.

1376960 1380422 I wanted to know if I had it
in me to do those things.
1380422 1381923 Maybe I have lost my mind,

1381965 1384968 but whoever I am, I'm still me,
and I'm not a killer.
1390974 1392308 I believe you.

1399941 1401943 -What?
-The car outside.
1401985 1403445 The one you arrived in.

1403486 1405780 It's a cop.
He dropped me off here.
1407949 1409659 I didn't know he was still here.
1413288 1414748 Hold it right there, mister!

1417167 1420170 -Wait. You have the wrong man.
-Stand aside, will you, please?
1420170 1421671 I didn't kill anyone.

1421671 1424007 Right now,
all you are is a suspect.

1424007 1427260 Turn yourself in. I'll listen
to whatever you have to say.

1427302 1429346 You won't believe
what I have to say.

1430513 1433808 -Try me.
-There's someone after me.

1433808 1437479 It's this group of men.
They want me dead.

1437479 1440357 And I don't even know if...
they're not even--

1440357 1442609 Yeah, who's going to listen
to a madman?

1442650 1445153 -Stand aside, Mrs. Murdoch.
-Run!
1449491 1451451 No one ever listens to me.
1457707 1458792 Murdoch, stop!

1501710 1504004 -How much further?
-We're almost there, buddy.

1507549 1509926 You happen to know
the way to Shell Beach?

1509926 1513013 You're kidding! Me and the wife
spent our honeymoon there.

1513096 1515598 All you do is
take Main Street West to...

1518560 1521771 Or is it the Cross...
Now, that's funny.

1521855 1524941 I can't seem to remember
if it's Main Street West...
1525025 1526276 or the Crosstown.

1530947 1534034 I'm sorry, lnspector,
I cannot be of more assistance,

1534117 1536077 but I am running late
for an appointment.

1536119 1538246 Well, I appreciate you
taking the time.

1546963 1549382 There's just one thing
that puzzles me.

1549424 1553970 I've met quite a few murderers
in the course of my work.

1553970 1556723 Murdoch doesn't
strike me as one.

1556765 1559934 Perhaps you are not accustomed
to digging deep enough.

1559976 1562812 Well, I do know when
someone is lying to me, Doctor.

1562896 1567108 Inspector, judging personalities
happens to be my business.

1567108 1569110 Maybe you can give me
a few pointers.

1569152 1573114 Certainly.
Let's take you, for instance.

1573156 1576242 You are a fastidious man.
Driven.
1576326 1578578 Consumed by details.

1578620 1582123 I would say
your life is rather lonely.

1582165 1584751 Good evening, lnspector.
I really must be going.

1628628 1630380 -How is he?
-The same.
1631715 1634342 Walenski? It's me, Frank.
1640724 1641891 Come in, Frank.
1645186 1646396 Close the door.

1654404 1657741 I've been looking through
some of your old reports.
1657741 1659868 It's an interesting case.
1660994 1664205 Kind that make a man's career.

1665915 1669544 -Or break it.
-Yeah. I was on that case.

1669586 1673423 And then what?
What happened then, Eddie?
1673423 1674883 Nothing happened, Frank.

1675925 1677927 I've just been spending time
in the subway,
1677927 1679888 riding in circles.

1679929 1683433 Thinking in circles.
There's no way out.
1685727 1687395 I've been over this entire city.

1691900 1693777 You're scaring your wife
to death, Eddie.
1693777 1695278 She's not my wife.

1697113 1700116 I don't know who she is
or who any of us are.

1700116 1703536 -What makes you say that?
-You think about the past much?
1705580 1707082 As much as the next guy.

1708083 1710794 See, I've been trying
to remember things--

1710877 1713963 clearly remember things
from my past.

1713963 1716132 But the more
I try to think back,

1716216 1719219 the more it all starts
to unravel.
1719260 1720428 None of it seems real.

1720428 1724599 It's like I've just
been dreaming this life,

1724641 1727602 and when I finally wake up,
I'll be somebody else,
1727644 1729646 somebody totally different.

1733983 1736152 You saw something,
didn't you, Eddie.
1737320 1739823 Something to do with the case.

1740448 1743827 There is no case!
There never was!

1743827 1747789 It's all just a big joke!
It's a joke!
1788830 1790540 Tonight's requirements are...
1790623 1793877 12 family photo albums,
1793877 1796338 nine personal diaries,
1798548 1800967 assorted childhood photographs,

1801009 1805180 requisite false l.D.s
and social security cards.
1805221 1807515 These do bring back memories.
1809851 1812145 This one is still warm.

1814064 1817317 The recollections of
a great lover?
1817359 1819652 A catalogue of conquests?
1820362 1821863 We will soon find out.

1823156 1824657 You wouldn't
appreciate that,

1824699 1827911 would you,
Mr. Whatever-your-name is?

1827911 1832248 Not the sort of conquest
you would ever understand.

1835585 1838338 A touch of
unhappy childhood...

1844010 1846596 A dash of
teenage rebellion...
1848181 1851267 And last but not least...

1851267 1853895 a tragic death
in the family.

1865407 1868952 Why does Murdoch not sleep
during the Tuning?

1869035 1873289 Maybe he's a step up
the evolutionary ladder.
1873289 1874541 A freak of nature.

1874582 1877419 He's adapting to survive.
What do you expect?

1877460 1879379 Weren't you looking for
the human soul?

1879421 1882048 Isn't that the purpose
of your little zoo?

1882090 1885427 That's why you change people
and things every night.

1885468 1888304 Maybe you have finally
found what you are looking for,

1888388 1889931 and it's going to bite you
on your--

1893977 1895895 It requires several
of your lifetimes...
1895937 1897605 to master our gifts.

1897647 1899441 The idea that
a simple man...

1899482 1901484 could develop the ability
to Tune is--
1901484 1902652 Absurd, I know.
1902652 1904988 What other explanation is there?
1957040 1958500 Shut it down.

1977018 1980146 Fredrickson says he'll take me
off the night shift.
1980188 1982023 It's about time, dear.
2058099 2060268 Can anyone hear me?
2063438 2066274 Let the Tuning commence.
2226101 2227477 The Goodwins.
2227477 2229479 Charlie, Sylvia,
2229562 2231648 Jane, and little Matthew.
2235485 2237737 Jane and little Matthew.
2267851 2270145 The rich get richer.

2270186 2272272 Probably have
maid's quarters...

2272355 2273690 before the night
is through.
2327243 2329204 Dr. Schreber, I presume.

2331873 2334000 That's no way to greet
a patient, Doctor,
2334042 2336169 if that's what you are.
2337712 2339547 Why is everyone asleep?
2339589 2341925 Please keep your voice down.

2342008 2343927 I can't remember anything.
What have you done?
2343927 2346763 Nothing. I want to help you.

2346763 2350225 We cannot talk here.
If they see us together--

2350266 2353103 I don't care.
I want some answers. Now!

2353186 2356272 Who are they?
Why are they trying to kill me?

2363613 2366700 -You really can do it.
-I did that?

2366741 2369369 Listen to me.
You have their power.

2369411 2371371 You can make things happen
by will alone.
2371413 2372956 They call it "Tuning."

2373039 2374958 That is how they change
the buildings.

2375041 2377544 Just now you acted
out of self-defense,

2377627 2380380 but I can teach you
to control your power.

2380422 2384384 We can stop them.
We can take the city back.

2443443 2445779 He made a terrible impression
for the firm,

2445820 2448656 Iollygagging around
as he did.

2448698 2451534 So I told Fredrickson
I was letting him go.
2451618 2453620 Well you should have, darling.

2454329 2457374 He attacked me.
I don't know where he's gone.

2457874 2461878 Come, Dr. Schreber.
We have much to do.

2466883 2473348 They say that
you're a runaround lover
2474391 2482482 Though you say it isn't so

2485360 2492200 But if you put me down
for another
2493827 2499708 I'll know, believe me, I'll know

2501167 2504671 Tonight's experiment will
take place in these locations.

2504713 2508758 The first subject
shall be imprinted on Avenue M.
2508758 2511761 Mr. Book, there is a problem.
2511845 2513430 There is no Avenue M.

2513430 2515348 We were unable
to complete it.

2515390 2518852 During the last Tuning,
we detected a lack of control.

2518893 2522105 An opposing influence
on the machines?

2522188 2526401 This man Murdoch is
more powerful than we thought.
2526443 2528403 He is becoming like us.
2528403 2531865 So we must become like him.
2532782 2535118 The doctor has done as we asked?

2535118 2538872 The life and times
of John Murdoch, volume two.
2540874 2543460 We must not do this.

2543460 2546880 Murdoch does not possess
these memories, yes?

2546921 2549758 How will his imprint
allow us to find him?

2549799 2553219 Everywhere he goes,
everyone he seeks out...
2553261 2554471 will be known to us.

2554554 2559642 And as he follows the clues,
so shall we follow the memories.
2559726 2562145 But to imprint one of us?
2562145 2564898 Failure has always resulted.

2564939 2568485 What Mr. Hand proposes
is our only option.
2575575 2577494 This may sting a bit.
2618201 2622038 I have John Murdoch in mind.

2624332 2628336 "Found this postcard
among your mother's things.

2628378 2630630 "Brings back memories,
doesn't it?
2630672 2632507 "Stop by sometime.

2632549 2635844 "We'll see if we can't
hook ourselves another mermaid.
2635885 2638179 "Love to Emma. Karl."
2646521 2648189 Karl Harris.

2665707 2668752 Excuse me.
Which way is Avenue C?
2668752 2670045 Try the subway.
2673757 2675258 You got a problem, pal?
2675258 2678094 Been working here long?

2678178 2681514 25 years.
No days off for good behavior.
2706623 2709584 We're looking for John Murdoch.

2743827 2745912 She knows nothing,
Mr. Hand.
2745954 2747789 A dead end, Mr. Wall.

2747831 2750583 We thought his imprint
would let us track him.

2750625 2753128 But instead
we have been brought here.

2753169 2757173 -This is irrational.
-Instincts are irrational.

2757257 2760510 We must follow
where they lead, yes?

2760593 2763847 Mr. Sleep suggests he may go
to places familiar.
2765265 2767308 He does not care about our job.
2767308 2770145 Indulge us, Mr. Hand.
2770186 2772856 If you were Murdoch, yes?
2772856 2776192 If I were Murdoch...

2778028 2781531 I would remember how
my wife had hurt me...
2781531 2783616 by sleeping with another man.

2788538 2792000 I would look for a way
to hurt her in return.

2795003 2799549 Leave me alone with her.
There's work to be done.

2803219 2805347 All change,
platform three.

2809184 2811519 Excuse me, how do I get
to the end of the line?
2811519 2813021 You want the Express.
2825575 2828078 How come the train didn't stop?
2828078 2829412 That's the Express.
2830914 2832874 There's no way out.

2832916 2835710 You can't get out of the city.
I've tried.
2836836 2838922 You're Murdoch, aren't you?

2838922 2840590 The one
they've been looking for.
2840674 2841758 You're not a killer.

2841841 2844552 They set you up with
a fake identity,
2844594 2846221 Iike everyone else here.

2846262 2848181 -Who are you?
-I was a cop.
2848223 2851351 At least in this life I was.
2851393 2854229 They steal peoples' memories.

2854270 2856064 Then they swap them around
between us.

2856106 2858775 I seen them do it,
back and forth...

2858858 2860944 till no one knows
who they are anymore.
2861027 2862278 How do you know all this?

2862362 2864114 Once in a while one of us
wakes up...
2864197 2865615 while they're changing things.

2866533 2869035 It's not supposed to happen,
but it does.
2869077 2870412 It happened to me.
2871079 2872956 They'll come looking for you.

2874124 2876459 Just like they'll come
looking for me.
2877919 2879129 I figured a way out.
2890598 2891808 They were here.
2895395 2897605 This was to be his home.
2900275 2902068 That was when we loved her.
2902110 2904446 This is all well and good,

2904487 2906489 but we require
a more practical link...
2906489 2908575 to his present whereabouts.
2913163 2915248 And I know where to find her.

2923673 2926968 We're very lucky,
when you think about it.

2928094 2930138 To be able to revisit
those places...

2930180 2932182 which meant
so very much to us.

2933016 2935518 I thought we were haunted
by them.

2937354 2939814 There used to be a ferry
when I was a boy.
2939856 2941941 Biggest thing you ever saw.

2941983 2944819 Lit up like
a floating birthday cake.

2946196 2948782 That's just what my husband
once said to me.
2948823 2950367 On this very spot.
2951868 2953953 Where is your husband now?

2953995 2957832 I wish I knew.
What brings you here?
2957832 2960710 I met my wife at this place.
2960710 2963004 It's where I met my husband.
2963046 2964547 Small world.
3066983 3068902 What are you doing here?
3068943 3070570 I've been following you.
3074491 3076159 Hold it right there!
3082332 3083667 It's been so damn long,

3083667 3085835 I thought you'd forgotten
your Uncle Karl.
3087003 3088463 You son of a gun!

3100016 3102185 -Is that me?
-Yeah.

3110485 3112195 Shell Beach is where
I grew up?

3112278 3114864 That's what I said.
Shell Beach.

3114948 3117367 -Your home town.
-I need to get there.
3117367 3118451 How do I get there?

3119869 3122789 I don't know.
I haven't been there in years.

3122831 3125709 You must remember.
You must have some idea.
3127669 3128878 Sorry, Johnny.

3130338 3132882 The old cracker barrel
ain't what it used to be.

3136678 3140140 -It was so bright there.
-Brighter times, I guess.

3141891 3145186 You were always scribbling
in that damn book.
3145228 3147188 That's me and your Pa.

3147230 3149566 What a couple of
handsome fools.
3149566 3151151 What happened to my parents?
3153695 3154821 Where are they now?
3156072 3157866 They're dead, Johnny.

3157907 3160660 They died when the house
burned down.
3160702 3162328 I looked after you.

3163246 3164998 You don't remember that,
really?
3167834 3170337 What's that? What is that?

3178053 3180388 You burned your arm pretty bad
in the fire.
3185935 3187520 What does it mean?
3187562 3189564 It means these are all lies!

3193610 3195945 My husband told me
he'd been here.

3196029 3198782 He told me he wanted
to test himself.
3212420 3214255 I wanted to talk to her.

3214297 3216257 I thought she could
help me find him.
3217967 3219969 I'm going to call the station.
3236111 3237320 It's beautiful.
3239989 3242826 It was a gift from my mother.
3242909 3244452 She died recently.

3245829 3248123 I keep it with me
to remind me of her.
3254963 3257090 It's a funny thing, though.

3257132 3259592 I can't remember
when she gave it to me.

3262012 3264472 How do you think I could
forget a thing like that?
3265974 3268435 What's happening, lnspector?
3268476 3270270 I'm not sure I know anymore.

3274274 3276026 I left your old room
like it was.
3277027 3279320 You can sleep here tonight.
3279362 3281489 Glad to have you back, Johnny.

3281489 3284284 -Even if it is for just a night.
-Karl.

3285368 3288038 -Is that the right time?
-Why, sure.

3288121 3290540 That clock's kept perfect time
since I bought it.

3293543 3296004 -What do you think?
-I don't understand.

3296004 3298798 How can it be night already?
What happened to the day?

3298840 3301343 You're tired.
Anything's possible.
3303011 3304012 Get some sleep.

3304012 3306514 We'll straighten all this out
tomorrow.

3360276 3363279 He's here.
He's acting peculiar.
3363279 3365699 I know. He's not himself.

3365740 3367784 Keep him there,
and I'll be right over.

3367784 3370078 -I'll try.
-Thanks. Bye.

3373623 3376960 I can't promise anything.
We'll play it as it comes.
3377752 3380588 We just wanted to help.
3387303 3390932 Karl. Uncle Karl.

3390974 3394436 If you're in trouble,
maybe we can do something.
3395895 3398398 Haven't seen you in so long.

3472972 3477644 Mr. Murdoch, you've been
the cause of much distress.

3482482 3484859 -Start talking.
-There's no need for this.

3484901 3488488 There's no escape.
The city's ours. We made it.
3488530 3489864 What are you talking about?

3489906 3492992 We fashioned this city
on stolen memories.

3493034 3496746 Different eras, different pasts,
all rolled into one.

3496830 3500875 Each night we revise it,
refine it, in order to learn.

3500917 3503920 -Learn what?
-About you.

3504004 3508383 You and your fellow inhabitants.
What makes you human.

3508425 3511928 -Why?
-We need to be like you.
3512721 3514889 I understand you now.

3514889 3518518 I remember that which you do
not, what you've been missing.

3518560 3524065 The ocean, yes? Running along
the waves as a child.

3524107 3528611 Meeting Emma at the river,
that first kiss that followed.

3529612 3532741 -What are you?
-You've seen what we are.
3532782 3535368 We use your dead as vessels.

3681514 3685435 -What about her? Ring a bell?
-She was alive when I left her.

3685435 3688521 -What about this?
-This is nothing.

3688563 3690774 It must mean something--
all those pictures.
3690774 3691775 What pictures?

3693276 3696112 -I don't understand this.
-Stop playing games with me.

3696196 3698615 -Stop telling me lies.
-I am not telling lies!

3698698 3701034 Help me out.
Make me understand.

3701076 3706039 I have this jigsaw puzzle in
my face, and it makes no sense.

3706081 3709417 You think it makes sense to me?
I'm as confused as you are.

3709459 3713380 Let me ask you a question.
Have you heard of Shell Beach?

3713421 3715548 -Sure.
-You know how to get there?

3717801 3723098 -Right. You just go to the...
-Where? Where do you go?
3723139 3724766 Give me a second, will you?
3726726 3728311 You can't remember, can you?
3729729 3732232 Thinking that's kind of odd?
3733441 3735485 Wait. I got a better one.

3735568 3739322 When was the last time you
did something during the day?

3739948 3742909 -What do you mean?
-I just mean during the day.

3744119 3746830 Daylight. When was the last
time you remember seeing it?

3746913 3750625 I'm not talking about a distant,
half-forgotten childhood memory.

3750667 3753420 I mean, like, yesterday.
Last week? When?
3754337 3756131 Do you have a single memory?
3757924 3759634 You don't, do you?

3759676 3765181 I don't think the sun
even exists in this place.

3765265 3769436 'Cause I've been up for hours
and hours, and night never ends.

3770020 3772313 -That's crazy.
-You're damn right it's crazy.

3772355 3775942 But listen to me, Bumstead.
It's not just me.

3775984 3778862 It's all of us. They're doing
something to all of us.

3778945 3780822 Shut up.
I've heard enough.

3780822 3783533 -Please listen--
-Shut up!
3794002 3796796 There has to be an explanation.
3804179 3805138 Explain this.

3829579 3832540 I never meant to hurt you.
I don't know why I did.
3832540 3834334 I wish I could take it back.
3835043 3837337 You didn't do it.
3837379 3839089 This affair of yours,

3839089 3842175 whatever you think you've done,
you didn't do it.
3842217 3843426 I don't believe it happened.

3843426 3847263 -What do you mean?
-This will sound crazy.

3847263 3850433 What if we never knew
each other before now?

3850433 3856690 What if the first time we met
was last night in our apartment?
3856731 3859442 And everything you remember,

3859526 3862737 and everything I'm supposed to
remember never really happened.

3862779 3865240 Someone just wants us
to think it did.
3866199 3867701 But how can that be true?

3868284 3871287 I so vividly remember
meeting you.

3872622 3874958 I remember falling in love
with you.

3876584 3879546 -I remember losing you.
-Time's up.

3881131 3885927 No, wait, please.
Just one more minute.
3892434 3893935 I love you, John.

3897313 3899482 You can't fake something
like that.
3931973 3934517 Inspector? Sir?

3935935 3938646 Detective Walenski
killed himself last night.
3940982 3942359 I thought you should know.

3945028 3949366 The chief wanted to see you.
Sir?

3956289 3958166 I knew you'd track
the killer down.

3987987 3991157 -How can we help you, sir?
-You can sleep.

4014097 4017684 I wanted to be the first to
congratulate you about the case.
4020270 4023106 Take us to Murdoch.
4054637 4056222 I knew you'd come eventually.

4056264 4058767 Isn't it time
you gave me some answers?

4060101 4062812 Yes, of course.
Won't you please sit down?
4066107 4067984 I come here often.

4067984 4070570 It's one of the few places
I'm allowed some peace.

4070987 4074074 You see, they have
an aversion to water.

4075075 4077077 One could almost call it
a phobia.

4077494 4080163 Who are they?
What do they want from me?

4081915 4086628 For now, let's say you're
the subject of their experiment.

4089798 4095637 I'm sorry, but I have no time
to do this the right way.

4095679 4099683 Everything you need to know
is in this syringe.

4099683 4103269 I need you to inject yourself.
It's the only way to understand.

4103311 4106147 -You're kidding, right?
-We're running out of time!

4106189 4109818 -You have to do this now.
-Give me the gun.

4109859 4112028 He's more disturbed
than we thought.

4112028 4114948 I may not be the judge
of personality you are,

4114989 4117951 but you're the one
who looks disturbed.

4117992 4120495 You don't know what
you're doing.
4121705 4125625 What exactly is in this, Doctor?

4127335 4130463 All the answers you've been
looking for, I swear to you.

4132382 4138179 Guess I'll hold on to it for
safekeeping, if you don't mind.
4138179 4139556 Let's go, Doctor.
4141057 4144227 Go? Where are we going?
4144686 4146396 Shell Beach.

4147522 4150984 That's where you wanted to go,
isn't it, the ocean?

4159826 4163246 Won't find anything there.
I've been there--
4163246 4165582 Then you can show us the way.

4165665 4169336 I won't. I refuse.
You can't make me go there.

4169377 4171755 Don't you understand?
They'll be waiting for us.

4181097 4185560 I don't understand.
There used to be a bridge here.

4190940 4194027 Try that again, and your friends
will find you in the canal.

4194069 4195862 Don't hurt me.
I'll tell you everything.

4195904 4197614 It doesn't matter anymore
anyway.
4208917 4210460 Who are you people?

4210877 4213630 Must go to the end
of the canal.

4214964 4217592 We will give you some more
pretty things soon...

4218760 4221096 -Anna.
-I'm not Anna.
4222764 4224808 You will be soon, yes.

4229062 4231898 I have another use
for her first.
4241408 4243284 I call them Strangers.

4243827 4246329 They abducted us
and brought us here.

4247497 4251960 This city, everyone in it...
is their experiment.

4251960 4254671 They mix and match our memories
as they see fit,

4254671 4257340 trying to divine
what makes us unique.

4257841 4260677 One day, a man might be
an inspector.

4260760 4263513 The next,
someone entirely different.

4263930 4267350 When they want to study
a murderer, for instance,

4267350 4271855 they simply imprint one of their
citizens with a new personality.

4271855 4276151 Arrange a family for him,
friends, an entire history...
4276192 4278028 even a lost wallet.
4278111 4280196 Then they observe the results.

4281489 4285660 Will a man, given the history of
a killer, continue in that vein?

4286161 4289706 Or are we, in fact, more than
the sum of our memories?

4289789 4294336 This business of you being
a killer was a sad coincidence.

4295003 4297547 You have had dozens of lives
before now.
4297630 4299049 You happened to wake up...

4299049 4301885 while I was imprinting you
with this one.
4301968 4303887 Why are they doing all this?

4304012 4308141 It is our capacity for
individuality, our souls...

4308183 4310018 that makes us different
from them.

4310018 4312520 They think they'll find
the human soul...

4312520 4315231 if they understand
how our memories work.

4315231 4319736 They have collective memories.
They share one group mind.

4319736 4324657 They're dying. Their race is
on the brink of extinction.

4324699 4327702 -They think we can save them.
-Where do I fit in?

4327744 4332248 You're different. You resisted
my attempt to imprint you.

4337212 4340674 Somehow, you have developed
their ability to Tune.

4340715 4343927 That is how they change things,
how they built this city.

4344010 4346888 They have machines buried
beneath the surface...

4346930 4350433 that allow them to focus
their telepathic energies.

4351226 4353853 They control everything here,
even the sun.

4353895 4357065 That's why it's always dark.
They can't stand the light.
4357107 4358566 Why do they need you?
4358608 4360568 When they first brought us here,

4360568 4364906 they extracted what was in us
and stored the information,
4364948 4366866 remixed it like paint...

4366908 4369411 and gave us back
new memories of their choosing.

4369452 4373081 But they still needed an artist
to help them.

4374791 4379796 I understood the human mind
better than they ever could,

4379796 4383425 so they allowed me to keep
my skills as a scientist...
4383466 4384926 because they needed them.

4384968 4387387 They made me delete
everything else.

4395979 4400442 Can you imagine what it's like
to erase your own past?

4400483 4403737 What about my past?
What about my childhood?
4404612 4406656 Shell Beach. Uncle Karl.

4407907 4411995 What about this?
This was blank when I found it.

4411995 4415915 You still don't understand.
You were never a boy.
4415957 4417250 Not in this place.

4417292 4420170 Your history is an illusion,
a fabrication,
4420170 4422005 as it is with all of us.

4422088 4424591 You made those drawings happen
with your gift.
4424632 4426134 You say they brought us here.
4433350 4436519 I'm sorry. I don't remember.

4437354 4441608 None of us remember that...
what we once were...

4441649 4445195 what we might have been...
somewhere else.

4463004 4466716 I've taken you this far.
You don't need me anymore.
4513179 4515432 There is no ocean, John.
4516725 4518852 There's nothing beyond the city.
4520437 4522939 The only place home exists...
4525191 4526776 is in your head.
4574157 4576284 Now you know the truth.

4635844 4638513 You'll allow yourself
to surrender...

4638555 4640849 or it will result in
this one's death.
4640890 4642058 What do I care?

4642559 4644644 She's not my real wife.
She's nothing to me.

4644686 4649357 But you do still care,
don't you, Mr. Murdoch?

4649399 4653653 I have become the monster
you were intended to be.

4655572 4659159 Shall I end her life now,
as you would have?

4662704 4668001 -Don't hurt her, please.
-Then surrender.
4716633 4720095 He is powerful, yes, dangerous.

4720136 4723473 But he can also lead us
to what we seek...
4723473 4726643 what the doctor calls the soul.

4726726 4730647 It is time for our experiment
to move into a final phase.

4730730 4733483 We no longer need
the other subjects.
4733566 4736945 The time for study is over.

4736945 4741282 It is time to be one
with John Murdoch.
4748123 4751459 It is time, Doctor. Imprint.
4754129 4756297 Shut it down!
4757173 4759634 Shut it down forever.
4774274 4775358 What are you doing?

4776276 4780989 They want to imprint you with
their own collective memories.

4782032 4784284 They want to make you
one of them...
4784325 4786494 so they can share your soul.
4786536 4788872 But I've got other plans.

4792208 4795128 Imprint, Doctor.
No more disobedience.

4795170 4799799 I'm sorry. The pain will
only last a moment.
4810894 4812645 Remember, John.

4813646 4815690 You'll rise to greater heights
than that.

4815732 4818193 One day when you're older,
you'll understand.

4821863 4824699 That's it, John.
Practice makes perfect.

4824741 4827994 Now, remember what I told you.
Never talk to strangers.
4828370 4829704 John, remember.

4829913 4832707 You're probably wondering why I
keep appearing in your memories.

4832749 4835168 It's because I have
inserted myself in them.

4835210 4839172 They were fabricated to
teach you about the Strangers.

4839214 4842342 Give you a lifetime of knowledge
in a single syringe.

4845178 4849849 You will survive, John. You'll
find strength within yourself.
4849891 4851434 And you will prevail.

4853937 4856189 -Hi, Uncle Karl.
-Johnny!

4859109 4863238 Getting the hang of it, John.
Maybe one day I'll work for you.

4863863 4867450 Here's the machine the Strangers
use to amplify their thoughts,

4867534 4869285 the machine that changes
their world.

4869285 4872580 You must take control of it.
You must make the machine yours.

4872622 4877210 I know you can beat them,
but you must concentrate.
4879254 4880463 Something's wrong.
4889264 4891141 There is no time for romance.

4891141 4893268 The world can be
what you make it.
4894269 4895311 What have you done?

4896438 4898565 You have the power
to make anything happen...
4898648 4900567 but you must act now.

5184851 5189105 I knew you could do it, John.
You have their power now.

5189189 5191441 -You control their machines.
-Where's Emma?

5192609 5197072 She's not Emma anymore.
She has been reimprinted.

5197072 5199366 -So give her back her memories.
-I can't.

5199407 5203453 The facility where they stored
the memories has been destroyed.
5206706 5208625 What are you going to do now?
5211628 5213129 I'm gonna fix things.

5214798 5218093 You told me I had the power,
didn't you?

5219052 5221971 I can make these machines
do anything I want.

5223056 5225100 Make this world
anything I want it to be.

5226309 5230397 Just so long as I concentrate
hard enough.
5314064 5315315 Where are you going?
5318735 5319736 Shell Beach.

5361111 5362612 -What's the fare?
-A quarter.
5419461 5421421 Been waiting for you, yes?

5422130 5426426 -What are you doing?
-I'm just making a few changes.

5426468 5431348 -We're sure that's what we want?
-I'll take my chances.

5431431 5437187 I'm dying, John. Your imprint
is not agreeable with my kind.

5437270 5439439 But I wanted to know
what it was like.
5441149 5442776 How you feel.

5442859 5445528 You know how I was
supposed to feel.

5445528 5449657 That person isn't me.
Never was.

5449699 5452869 You wanted to know what it was
that makes us human.

5453995 5457791 Well, you're not going to
find it in here.

5459376 5461211 You went looking
in the wrong place.
5560435 5562228 It's so beautiful here.

5575241 5577285 Do you know if Shell Beach
is around here?
5577994 5580413 I think that's it over there.
5598640 5600642 I'm headed that way myself.
5602644 5603978 Would you like to join me?

5613530 5617117 I'm Anna, by the way.
What's your name?
